DOC.brief_summary: 300 recurrent implantation failure patients will be alternatively assigned to assisted hatching , endometrial scratch , and no treatment ,100 patients in each group
DOC.brief_title: Assisted Hatching Versus Endometrial Scratch in Recurrent Implantation Failure
DOC.detailed_description: Group 1 consists of 100 patients will undergo endometrial scratch followed by controlled ovarian hyperstimulation Group 2 consists of 100 patients will undergo controlled ovarian hyperstimulation& assisted hatching Group 3 consists of 100 patients will undergo controlled ovarian hyperstimulation
DOC.criteria: recurrent implantation failure normal uterine cavity by transvaginal ultrasound endometrial polyp or fibroid distorting the endometrium hydrosalpinx preimplantation genetic diagnosis severe male factor
